detaileddescription.para: ARC baseline instruction set version number
ARC CPU Clock Frequency in Hz unit ARC PC size

Reduced register option, if enabled, ARC_FEATURE_RF16 will be defined Unaligned access option, if enabled, ARC_FEATURE_UNALIGNED will be defined Code density option, if enabled, ARC_FEATURE_CODE_DENSITY will be defined
The number of register file banks
The number of registers replicated per register bank Interrupt unit presence FIRQ_OPTION configuration option, 1 for enabled, 0 for disabled

The number of interrupts The number of external interrupts The interrupt priority levels Timer0 present or not Timer1 present or not Secure Timer0 present or not Secure Timer1 present or not 64bit RTC present or not ICCM Presence, base address and size ICCM0 Presence, base address and size ICCM1 Presence, base address and size DCCM Presence, base address and size ARC XY memory options Peripheral memory region(DMP) base address, if dmp configured, this macro will be defined as base address MPU options Secure BCR SEC_BUILD BCR Data Cache options Instruction Cache options ARC uDMA options ARC mpy option

memberdef.name: ARC_FEATURE_FPU_DSP_CONTEXT
memberdef.initializer: 1 /* whether to put FPU and DSP regs into the context */

detaileddescription.para: ARC FPU options ARC DSP options ARC Stack check options

briefdescription.para: Header file for arc feature configuration.
